-- Megatron --

Megatron pauses for a second, "Hmmm, he proved that it wasn't 
entirely his fault, so he may prove useful in the future. Put him in 
the CR chamber, and let his body rebuild itself."

Now to figure out how to deal with the newcomer, Galvatron, and his 
crew.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "catmastero" <catmastero@y...> wrote:
> "As you command Royalty" Inferno said, he grabbed a metal barrel 
from 
> the storage bay then ran to control room and quickly tossed the 
> remains of Switchblade into it "What shall I do with the remains 
my 
> queen?"
>
